annexes.name: agree

statements.name: Req001_GeoMonitorEvent
statements.label: The output event only fires when observed is valid

annexes.sourceText:
{**
            -- a constant generated from the component property above, handy for expressing the monitor guarantee
            const is_latched : bool = Get_Property(this, CASE_Properties_stub::Monitor_Latched);
                   
            property CASE_Monitor_Coord_policy = Historically(event(observed) => 
                (WAYPOINTS_IN_ZONE(observed, keep_in_zone) and WAYPOINTS_NOT_IN_ZONE(observed, keep_out_zone))
            );
        
            -- Monitor guarantee
            -- Note: user specifies when output is sent; either when the monitor policy is satisfied or its negation.
            guarantee Req001_GeoMonitorEvent \"The output event only fires when observed is valid\" :
                if is_latched and prev(event(alert), not CASE_Monitor_Coord_policy) then
                    event(alert) = true and not event(output)
                else
                    if event(observed) then
                        if CASE_Monitor_Coord_policy then
                            event(output) and output = observed and not event(alert)
                            -- event(ouput) = true ; output = observed ; event(alert) = false
                        else
                            not event(output) and event(alert)
                            -- event(ouput) = false; event(alert) = true
                    else
                        not event(output) and not event(alert);
                        -- event(ouput) = false; event(alert) = false
                                    
            fun WAYPOINTS_NOT_IN_ZONE(mission : Mission, zone : Map) : bool =
              forall waypoint in mission, not WAYPOINT_IN_ZONE_RECTANGLE(waypoint, zone);
              
            fun WAYPOINTS_IN_ZONE(mission : Mission, zone : Map) : bool =
              forall waypoint in mission, WAYPOINT_IN_ZONE_RECTANGLE(waypoint, zone);              
            
            -- Assumes rectangle that is defined by two corners so it is aligned
            -- with the origin (not rotated in space)
            -- Assumes that the altitude is the same in all the coordinates
            -- Assmes zone[0] is the bottom left corner and zone[1] in the upper right corner
            fun WAYPOINT_IN_ZONE_RECTANGLE(waypoint : Coordinate.Impl, zone : Map) : bool = 
                  (waypoint.latitude >= (zone[0]).latitude)
              and (waypoint.latitude <= (zone[1]).latitude)
              and (waypoint.longitude >= (zone[0]).longitude)
              and (waypoint.longitude <= (zone[1]).longitude)
              and (waypoint.altitude >= (zone[0]).altitude);
        **}
